attributes.action: Stop petty School uniform rules affecting our children's Education
attributes.additional_details: Beginning of school after 6wks sent my child in plain black trousers &suede shoes, she got put in isolation where she learnt nothing.Called the school told them I was on nights & I would correct uniform the wkend.was told to write a note and it should b ok. following day my child was put in isolation. Called the school they told me she would stay in isolation until it was rectified. The wkend I got looser trousers & plain black leather shoes. She was put in isolation again 2day for the material.
attributes.background: Schools used to b focuses on our child's education, Now they are focused on what material they are wearing. Children all over are being put in isolation learning nothing due to wearing the wrong material shoes or trousers. As long as they r wearing appropriate uniform the material shouldn't matter.
